thumb.name: All About Love Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EChuck%3Cbr%3Eand%3Cbr%3ECindy%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe%26#146;re what love is all about.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine%26#146;s Day.%3Cbr%3EChuck%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith All My Love.%3Cbr%3ECindy%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Little Love Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine's Day.%3Cbr%3EMorgan!%3Cbr%3EIt's just me.%3Cbr%3ESandy...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...sending you%3Cbr%3Ea little love!

thumb.name: I Wonder If...
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EJust for You. Sandy. on Valentine's Day%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EI wonder if you realize how many times a day I stop and think about you in a very special way%26#133;I wonder if you realize the love and warm thoughts. too. I've put inside this Valentine because it's meant for you! Have a Wonderful Day%3Cbr%3E
